source_sentence: 佛說灌洗佛形像經
translation: Sutra on the Consecration and Washing of Buddha Images

source_sentence: 西晉沙門釋法炬譯
translation: Translated by the Śākyamuni Shi Farō

source_sentence: 爾時佛告摩訶剎頭諸天人民：「皆一心聽。」
translation: It was then that the Buddha addressed the Mahāsatya gods and people, "All listen with one mind."

source_sentence: 佛言：「人身難得，無為道亦然，佛世難值。
translation: The Buddha said, "The human person is difficult to attain, so is the path to nothingness, and it's difficult to attain the Buddhahood in this world.

source_sentence: 吾本從阿僧祇劫時，身為白衣累劫積德，每生自剋展轉五道，不貪財寶棄身施與無所愛惜。
translation: Since the incalculably long eon when I was a white-clothed man who accumulated virtue over many eons, I've been self-reflective of each birth and have continued on through the five destinies, not craving possessions or treasure, giving up my body and charity, and not caring about anything.

source_sentence: 自致為王太子，以四月八日夜半明星出時，生墮地行七步，舉右手而言：『天上天下唯吾為尊，當為天人作無上師。』
translation: When the stars rose at midnight on the eighth day of the fourth month, I was born as the king's crown prince, fell to the ground, took seven steps, raised my right hand, and said, 'I'm the only one in heaven and on earth who's honored, and I will be a supreme teacher for gods and humans.'

source_sentence: 太子生時地為大動，第一四天王，乃至梵天、忉利天王，其中諸天各持十二種香和湯雜種名花以浴太子。
translation: When the prince was born, the ground was greatly disturbed, and the first four heavenly kings, even the Brahma gods and the king of the Thirty-three gods, each of those gods carried 12 kinds of incense, hot water, and various famous flowers to bathe the prince.

source_sentence: 太子得成佛道，開現聖法濟度群氓。」
translation: The prince then became a buddha and revealed the noble teaching to save all the rogues."

source_sentence: 佛告諸天人民：「十方諸佛皆用四月八日夜半時生，十方諸佛皆用四月八日夜半時出家，入山學道。
translation: The Buddha told the gods and people, "It's the eighth day of the fourth month when all the buddhas of the ten directions are born at midnight, and it's the eighth day of the fourth month when all the buddhas of the ten directions leave home and enter the mountains to train on the path.

source_sentence: 十方諸佛皆用四月八日夜半時成佛，十方諸佛皆用四月八日夜半時而般涅槃。」
translation: It was at midnight on the eighth day of the fourth month that all the buddhas of the ten directions became buddhas, and it was at midnight on the eighth day of the fourth month that all the buddhas of the ten directions attained parinirvāṇa."

source_sentence: 佛言：「所以用四月八日者，以春夏之際殃罪悉畢，萬物普生毒氣未行，不寒不熱時氣和適，正是佛生之日。
translation: The Buddha said, "The reason we use the eighth day of the fourth month is that it's the time of spring and summer when all the bad and evil things have ended, when everything is growing in abundance and when poisonous breath hasn't yet run its course, and when it's neither cold nor hot and the weather is pleasant, which is when the buddhas are born.

source_sentence: 諸善男子、善女人，於佛滅後當至心念佛無量功德之力，浴佛形像如佛在時，得福無量不可稱數。」
translation: Good sons and good women, after the Buddha's death, you must wholeheartedly remember the Buddha's immeasurable merits and bathe his image as if he were here, which will bring immeasurable fortune beyond calculation."

source_sentence: 佛言：「我本行菩薩道時，三十六返為天王釋，三十六反作轉輪聖王，三十六返作飛行皇帝。
translation: The Buddha said, "When I started out on the bodhisattva path, I was the king of the gods 36 times, the holy wheel-turning king 36 times, and the flying emperor 36 times.

source_sentence: 諸有佛弟子信心善意者，當念十方諸佛功德善，若以香花雜物浴佛形像者所願皆得，諸天龍神常隨擁護皆當證明。」
translation: All Buddha disciples who have faith and good intentions should remember the merits and virtues of the buddhas in the ten directions, and if they bathe a buddha image with flowers and various things, they'll obtain whatever they wish, and the gods and dragons will always follow and protect them."

source_sentence: 佛告諸弟子：「夫人身難得、經法難聞，其有天人能自減損妻子之分、五家財物，用浴佛形像者，如佛在時，所願悉得。
translation: The Buddha told his disciples, "A woman's body is difficult to obtain, and the sūtras and teachings are difficult to hear, so if there are gods who can reduce their wives' share and the five possessions of their families and use them to bathe a Buddha's image, they'll get everything they wish for while the Buddha is still alive.

source_sentence: 欲求度世取無為道生生不與死會者可得，欲求精進勇猛如釋迦文佛者可得，欲求如文殊師利阿惟越致菩薩者可得，欲求轉輪聖王飛行教化者可得，欲求辟支佛阿羅漢者可得，欲求永離三惡道者可得，欲求生天上人間富樂者可得，欲求百子千孫者可得，欲求長壽無病者可得。
translation: They can attain it if they want to save the world and obtain the path of nothingness, attain it if they want to be as energetic and courageous as Śākyamuni Buddha, attain it if they want to be like Mañjuśrī Advaita, attain it if they want to be taught by the flying wheel-turning sage king, attain it if they want to be an arhat of the pratyekabuddhas, attain it if they want to be permanently freed from the three bad destinies, attain it if they want to be born in the heavens among humans and be rich and happy, attain it if they want to have a hundred sons and a thousand grandchildren, and attain it if they want to live a long life without illness.

source_sentence: 世間人民貪欲如海，寧割身上一臠肉，不肯出一錢物與人。
translation: People in the world have desires as great as the ocean, preferring to cut off a cut of flesh from their bodies rather than give a single coin to someone.

source_sentence: 人生時不持一錢來，死亦不持一錢去，財物故在世間，人死當獨去憶如此苦。
translation: When a person is born, he doesn't bring a single penny with him, and when he dies, he doesn't bring a single penny with him; his possessions are therefore in the world, and when he dies, he'll be left alone to remember such suffering.

source_sentence: 乃浴佛形像者，持是功德生死相隨，無有斷期。」
translation: Someone who bathes in an image of the Buddha will maintain this merit and be followed through birth and death without break."

source_sentence: 佛言：「若人有一善之心，作是功德者，諸天善神、天龍八部、四天王等，僉然擁護。
translation: The Buddha said, "If a person has one good intention and makes this merit, the gods, goddesses, dragons, eight groups of gods, and four heavenly kings will all support them.

source_sentence: 浴佛形像福報所生，常得清淨，從是因緣得成佛道(此下三十一行經文丹本所無，宋本自有，存之)。」
translation: Bathing the Buddha's image will always result in his being purified by the blessings and rewards, and from these causes and conditions he'll attain the Buddha Way (the following thirty-one lines of the sūtra are not in the Dan edition but were in the Song edition, so they survive)."

source_sentence: 佛言：「持好香浴佛形像者，自得其福，智在清淨功德名聞。
translation: The Buddha said, "Those who bathe a Buddha image with a nice scent will attain their own fortune, and their knowledge will be known for its pure qualities.

source_sentence: 諸持好華散佛上者，自得其福，端政好色無有雙比。
translation: Those who carry nice flowers scattered on top of the Buddha will attain their own fortune, and there's nothing comparable to their dignified and beautiful appearance.

source_sentence: 諸持繒幡上佛者，自得其福，在所從生當得自然好衣無極。」
translation: Those who carry a silken banner on top of the Buddha will attain their own merit, and they'll be naturally clothed in nice clothing that has no limit when they're born there."

source_sentence: 佛言：「我累功積德行善至誠，持戒、忍辱、精進、一心、智慧，乃自致得作佛。
translation: The Buddha said, "I've accumulated so much merit and virtue, practiced goodness and sincerity, observed precepts, tolerated humility, diligence, single-mindedness, and wisdom, that I've attained Buddhahood on my own.

source_sentence: 今日賢者某甲皆為慈心好意，信向佛道欲求度脫，持種種香花浴佛形像，皆為七世父母五種親屬兄弟妻子在厄難中故、為十方五道中勤苦故、為佛人民愚癡不信佛道故，令其後世生為人，端好潔白眾人所敬，塵垢不著身。
translation: Today, good men and women of good will, faithful to the Buddha's path and seeking deliverance, carry various flowers and scents and bathe images of the Buddha for the sake of the seven generations of parents, the five kinds of relatives, brothers, and wives in distress, the five destinies in the ten directions of suffering, and the foolishness of the Buddha's people who don't believe in the Buddha's path, so that in subsequent lifetimes they'll be born as human beings who are beautiful, clean, and respected by everyone, and dust doesn't stick to their bodies.

source_sentence: 在所從生，常與佛會；在所從生，常與法會；在所從生，常與比丘僧會。
translation: He'll always meet with the Buddha wherever he's born, always meet with the Dharma wherever he's born, and always meet with the monks and nuns wherever he's born.

source_sentence: 令某甲明經，智慧曉了，佛十二部經、四阿含、安般守意、三十七品、四意止、四意斷、四神足、五根、五力、七覺、八直行道，若能至心求佛道者，疾得阿惟越致。
translation: He will cause someone to understand the sūtras and know with wisdom the twelve sūtras of the Buddha, the four Āgamas, the mind of Anapanthapiṇḍika, the thirty-seven factors, the four mental stops, the four mental eliminations, the four miraculous abilities, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven awarenesses, and the eightfold correct path, and if he can wholeheartedly pursue the Buddha's path, he'll quickly attain abhidharma.

source_sentence: 「令其得佛三十二相，八十種好紫磨金色。
translation: "They'll attain the Buddha's thirty-two characteristics and eighty major attributes, which are purple and gold in color.

source_sentence: 十種力、四無所畏、十八不共。
translation: He has ten powers, four forms of fearlessness, and 18 distinctive characteristics.

source_sentence: 口出八種音聲，飛行洞視在所至到。
translation: His mouth produces eight kinds of sounds, and he flies and sees through to wherever he goes.

source_sentence: 諸天、龍、鬼神、鬼子母官屬擁護其身，令行出入當得安隱。
translation: The gods, dragons, demons, and the officials of the demon's children and mothers protect his body, so that his travels will be peaceful when he enters and leaves.

source_sentence: 若行山中不逢虎狼，若入軍旅不被兵甲，若行江湖不逢風波。
translation: If he travels in the mountains, he won't encounter tigers and wolves, if he enters the army, he won't be armored, and if he travels in rivers and lakes, he won't encounter turbulence.

source_sentence: 令床上無有病瘦者，當令縣官無呼召者，有妻子女產生難令得安隱。
translation: He'll make sure there's no sick or thin person on his bed, make sure there's no one summoned by the magistrate, and make it safe for his wife and daughter to have difficulties.

source_sentence: 若行賈販財利百倍，眾邪惡氣不得妄干，水火盜賊怨家債主不得妄害。
translation: If he practices merchandising, his wealth will be one hundredfold more profitable, so that evil spirits won't be mistakenly interfered with, and floods, fires, thieves, and lenders won't be mistakenly harmed.

source_sentence: 口舌消滅皆令厭伏，令其精進莫得中悔，行如菩薩得道如佛。」
translation: He'll extinguish speech and cause them to become disillusioned, cause them to make effort and not regret it, and practice like a bodhisattva who has attained the path like a buddha."

source_sentence: 佛說灌洗佛形像經
translation: Sutra on Consecrating and Washing Buddha Images

source_sentence: 此經宋藏題云摩訶剎頭經聖堅譯，今按《開元錄》，宋藏錯亂，故依丹本改為灌洗佛形像經，法炬譯。
translation: According to the Song Canon, this sūtra is titled the Translation of the Sutra of Mahāsatra by Shengjian, but according to the Kaiyuan Record, the Song Canon was confused, so the Dan edition was changed to the Translation of the Sutra on the Image of the Consecrated Buddha by Fajiao.

source_sentence: 又宋藏此經初首即云「摩訶剎等乃至二紙經文」，全是《摩訶剎頭經》文，二經不殊。
translation: The Song Canon also begins this sūtra with the words, "The text of the Mahāsaṃbhavajña and even the two-page sūtra," which is the text of the Mahāsaṃbhavajña-sūtra, and the two sūtras are not different.

source_sentence: 今依丹本，以爾時佛告摩訶剎頭乃至從是因緣得成佛道等二紙遆之。
translation: We'll now rely on the Dan edition and use the two pages from the time the Buddha told Mahāsatra and even from this cause and condition he could achieve the Buddha Way.

source_sentence: 從佛言浴佛形像已下三十一行經文，於宋本中本自有之，而今仍存。
translation: The thirty-one lines of sūtra text from the time the Buddha spoke of bathing the Buddha's image downward had its origin in the Song edition and still exists today.
